name: Re:Wind (Spheya)
description:
This is an arcade 2d shooter game where time gets rewinded when you die, and then your previous self will help out defeating the enemies. But if you die whilst you are already in the past (i.e. your previous self is on screen), then it's game over.

Movement:

  • WASD for walking
  • Mouse for shooting

Made by me(@Spheyaaa) and @ChillPenguin93

Have fun!
